title: Class explores cover crops in ag systems

tasks.task: Participating in a university agricultural course focused on cover crops
subtasks: Planting a cover crop mixture with a graduate student
Noticing competition between cover crop species
Observing real-world interaction between plants and their environment

tasks.task: Teaching assistant program with multiple universities
subtasks: Co-teaching a class on cover crops
Instructing students on cover crop management

tasks.task: Conducting soil health research using cover crops
subtasks: Burying specific underwear in different fields
Monitoring decomposition rate of buried underwear

tasks.task: Discussing cover crop challenges and benefits
subtasks: Examining economic incentives for cover crop use
Analyzing long-term benefits and short-term costs
Understanding factors influencing cover crop adoption
